snippet: Stocks have defied predictions that a sell-off would come after the spring surge as signs emerged the growth could be set for a slowdown.
abstract: Stocks rise, defying predictions that sell-off would come after spring surge as signs emerged the growth could be set for slowdown.
lead_paragraph: Stocks have defied predictions that a sell-off would come after the spring surge as signs emerged the growth could be set for a slowdown.

headline.main: Market Continues to Climb, Defying Fears of a Sell-Off
headline.print_headline: Market Continues to Climb, Defying Fears of a Sell-Off
